name: Free Robot Voice Transformer
description:
Ever wanted to sound like a robot? Now you can!

Transform yourself into a robot! Free Robot Voice Transformer allows you to change your voice into one of the twelve voices available in Robot Voice Transformer.

The Nano-bot robot voice is a high-tech robot that will amuse you and your friends.

*** iPod Touch Users ***

To be able to record your voice on an iPod Touch requires the use of an external microphone. Just plug the microphone into the device before recording.
